title: n1dus
author: Hidki
description: NSP/XCI manager for the Nintendo Switch
details:
n1dus formerly known as dOPUS is an installer and converter of NSP and XCI files for the Nintendo Switch. It is Based on Tinfoil and 4NXCI.

DISCLAIMER: Use dOPUS at your own risk. I'm not responsible for any damage, data loss, or anything else dOPUS may cause.

Requires sdmc:/keys.dat in order to extract/install XCI files.

Keys can be extracted using tesnos' kezplez or shchmue's fork of kezplez. Hers supports the fuses and TSEC being dumped in multiple locations as well as also supporting firmware 6.0.
changelog:
0.7

dOPUS becomes n1dus
No more need for exFAT! Can now install and extract both NSP and XCI files over 4GB on a FAT32 SD Card :) (exFAT is notorious for being prone to file corruptions on the Switch). Read instructions there!
Clock will now show the right time according to your switch timezone setting (thanks libnx :) ).
Now will look for keys.dat, keys.txt or prod.keys in '/', '/switch', or '/switch/n1dus'
